Bash(gh release create v1.0.1 --title "v1.0.1" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

### Easier Customization
- Added centralized site config \(`src/config/site.ts`\) - fork and customize in one file
- Updated Hero and Connect components to use the config
- Expanded README with detailed customization instructions

### Custom Domain
- Site now available at `newyen.dev`
- Updated siteUrl configuration

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed Stack Exchange API 400 error in useStackOverflow hook
- Centralized SWR configuration to reduce duplication

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nathannewyen/v4/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh release create v1.0.2 --title "v1.0.2" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

### CI/CD Improvements
- CI workflow now triggers on both `main` and `develop` branches
- Pull requests to either branch will run lint, test, and build checks

### Contributing Guidelines
- Updated CONTRIBUTING.md to require running tests before submitting PRs
- Contributors should now branch from and PR to `develop`

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nathannewyen/v4/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh release create v1.0.3 --title "v1.0.3" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed Stack Overflow section failing to load due to API rate limiting
- Added optional Stack Exchange API key support \(`NEXT_PUBLIC_STACKEXCHANGE_API_KEY`\)

### Contributing
- Added branch naming conventions to CONTRIBUTING.md
- Contributors must now create `feature/*` or `fix/*` branches \(no direct commits to `develop`\)

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nathannewyen/v4/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3
EOF
\)")
